sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-textarea v-model="internalAnswer" placeholder="请输入答案" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref, watch } from "vue";

export default {
  // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
  name: "Subjective",
  props: {
    question: Object,
    modelValue: String,
  },
  setup(props, { emit }) {
    const internalAnswer = ref(props.modelValue);

    watch(internalAnswer, (newValue) => {
      emit("update:modelValue", newValue);
    });

    return {
      internalAnswer,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 你的样式 */
</style>
